thread.title: 27 Totally '90s Costumes That Are All That. Walkman Optional
thread.title_full: 27 Totally '90s Costumes That Are All That. Walkman Optional

author: Kimberly Yam
title: 27 Totally '90s Costumes That Are All That. Walkman Optional
text:
27 Totally '90s Costumes That Are All That. Walkman Optional Word. Kimberly Yam Associate Good News Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/09/2015 04:16 PM EDT | Edited: 12 minutes ago 
"Clueless"! "The Sandlot"! Kurt Cobain! You really think there's a decade with more costume-worthy pop culture than the '90s? As if! 
What better way to make a splash on the Halloween scene this year than with a get-up inspired by the 10 years that were definitely da bomb? Luckily for you, we've rounded up 27 costumes to bring you and your friends back to the supafly decade. 
From Salt-N-Pepa to a Got Milk? advertisement, t hese ideas are better than your favorite pogs, Lunchables and Lisa Frank designs -- combined. 1
